stratagems.legend: This unit is equipped with a scramble field generator, a device capable of disrupting teleportation beacons and other homing technology.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your opponent’s Reinforcements step.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of your unit.
stratagems.when: Start of your opponent’s Reinforcements step.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of your unit.

stratagems.name: TANGLEFOOT GRENADES
stratagems.legend: Employed by skirmishers and recon troops, tanglefoot grenades ensnare advancing infantry, slowing their advance.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM GRENADES unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as the target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).
stratagems.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM GRENADES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as the target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

stratagems.name: CALLOUS SACRIFICE
stratagems.legend: All victory requires sacrifice. The destruction of the enemy must always take priority over the preservation of lives.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.
stratagems.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

stratagems.name: TRENCH FIGHTERS
stratagems.legend: Inured to the savage horrors of trench warfare, these warriors will fight until their last breath.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if it is a REGIMENT model. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if it is a REGIMENT model. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: OVER THE TOP
stratagems.legend: The whistle blows to signal the attack. Waves of infantry emerge from cover to advance upon the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Command phase.TARGET: One INFANTRY OFFICER model from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, when your model issues the Move! Move! Move! Order, it can issue that Order to any number of eligible friendly INFANTRY REGIMENT units, regardless of range to your model.
stratagems.target: One INFANTRY OFFICER model from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, when your model issues the Move! Move! Move! Order, it can issue that Order to any number of eligible friendly INFANTRY REGIMENT units, regardless of range to your model.

stratagems.name: FURIOUS FUSILLADE
stratagems.legend: Whilst accuracy has its benefits, sheer weight of fire is no less effective at bringing down the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit while targeting an enemy unit within half range.
stratagems.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit while targeting an enemy unit within half range.

stratagems.name: FLARE BURST
stratagems.legend: As the infantry assault proceeds, flares are fired into the skies, illuminating opponents below.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes an attack that targets a visible enemy unit within 12", you can re-roll the Hit roll.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes an attack that targets a visible enemy unit within 12", you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: MINEFIELD
stratagems.legend: Sappers have laid down a network of mines across the battlefield. Should the enemy attempt an ill-advised assault, they will surely suffer for it.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.TARGET: One PLATOON unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit ends a Charge move within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
stratagems.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One PLATOON unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit ends a Charge move within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

stratagems.name: AGAINST THE ODDS
stratagems.type: Tempestus Boarding Regiment – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Tempestus Scions are trained in a range of specialist hand-to-hand combat techniques. Coupled with combat stimms, these make them bruising foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.
stratagems.target: One MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

stratagems.name: BRUTAL CHOKE POINT
stratagems.type: Tempestus Boarding Regiment – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Emptying the magazines of their weapons in an indiscriminate hail of fire, the Scions create a zone of lethality that foes will struggle to advance into.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase, just after a MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army has shot.TARGET: That MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, subtract 2 from the Move characteristic of models in that enemy unit, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.target: That MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, subtract 2 from the Move characteristic of models in that enemy unit, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

stratagems.name: IDLE HANDS
stratagems.type: Tempestus Boarding Regiment – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Voidborne Scions are trained to swiftly goad the machine spirits of bulkheads and hatches, slamming them shut in their wake to trap the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, after your unit ends a move, you can select one open Hatchway it moved through during that move; close that Hatchway.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, after your unit ends a move, you can select one open Hatchway it moved through during that move; close that Hatchway.

stratagems.name: DUCK AND COVER
stratagems.type: Tempestus Boarding Regiment – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Employing coordinated helm chronos, the Scions execute a pre-arranged simultaneous tactical manoeuvre.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Command phase.TARGET: One OFFICER model from your army.EFFECT: Select one Order your model can issue. Every ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army is issued that Order (regardless of any keywords those units are normally required to have).RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, OFFICER models from your army cannot issue Orders. You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.target: One OFFICER model from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one Order your model can issue. Every ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army is issued that Order (regardless of any keywords those units are normally required to have).RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, OFFICER models from your army cannot issue Orders. You can only use this Stratagem once.

stratagems.name: FIRING HOT
stratagems.legend: At the risk of permanently burning out power packs, hot-shot weaponry can be temporarily overcharged to provide additional punch at the crucial moment.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One MILITARUM TEMPESTUS or KASRKIN unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of hot-shot lascarbines, hot-shot lasguns, hot-shot laspistols, hot-shot marksman rifles, hot-shot volley guns and sentry hot-shot volley guns equipped by models in your unit by 1.
stratagems.target: One MILITARUM TEMPESTUS or KASRKIN unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of hot-shot lascarbines, hot-shot lasguns, hot-shot laspistols, hot-shot marksman rifles, hot-shot volley guns and sentry hot-shot volley guns equipped by models in your unit by 1.

stratagems.name: BELLICOSA DROP
stratagems.legend: Bellicosa drop protocols require intensive additional training but enable elite Imperial soldiery to land virtually on top of the enemy’s positions.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that is in Reserves and has the Deep Strike ability.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, when your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.
stratagems.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that is in Reserves and has the Deep Strike ability.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, when your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.name: ON MY POSITION
stratagems.legend: Circling Aeronautica Imperialis strike fighters wait above to launch strafing runs should the attack falter. In extremis, these assets can be called down upon Imperial positions in danger of being overrun, affording soldiers the desperate dignity of taking their enemies with them into death.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.TARGET: One REGIMENT INFANTRY unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Then, your unit suffers 3D3 mortal wounds.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One REGIMENT INFANTRY unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Then, your unit suffers 3D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: AERIAL EXTRACTION
stratagems.legend: Such swift manoeuvres are vital to retaining command of the developing tactical situation, whether gunships are peeling off to strike at the enemy from a fresh angle or infantry being extracted by dropcraft for rapid redeployment.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.TARGET: One VALKYRIE unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, or one ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has the Deep Strike ability and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One VALKYRIE unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, or one ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has the Deep Strike ability and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: SERVO‑DESIGNATORS
stratagems.legend: Released in a swarm from a modified Valkyrie gunship, high-altitude servo-skulls analyse targeting data from the ongoing fight and then provide updated firing solutions to the troops on the ground.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army has shot.TARGET: That ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks that is visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.target: That ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks that is visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

stratagems.name: FIRE AND RELOCATE
stratagems.legend: Once deployed, it is vital that the soldiers stay on the move and keep firing, avoiding becoming bogged down and maintaining the pressure on their reeling foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: COORDINATED ACTION
stratagems.legend: The potency of armour and infantry is greatly enhanced when both work in close concert.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of any phase.TARGET: One REGIMENT unit from your army and one SQUADRON unit from your army within 6" of and visible to that REGIMENT unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, Orders affecting one of your units affect the other, and vice versa.
stratagems.target: One REGIMENT unit from your army and one SQUADRON unit from your army within 6" of and visible to that REGIMENT unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, Orders affecting one of your units affect the other, and vice versa.

stratagems.name: FIELDS OF FIRE
stratagems.legend: Armour and infantry work in concert, forming overlapping fields of fire against which neither cover nor heavy armour can protect.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One REGIMENT unit and one SQUADRON unit from your army that have not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit. Until the end of the phase, each time your selected REGIMENT and SQUADRON units make an attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.target: One REGIMENT unit and one SQUADRON unit from your army that have not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit. Until the end of the phase, each time your selected REGIMENT and SQUADRON units make an attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: STALWART PROTECTOR
stratagems.legend: The indefatigable tanks of the Astra Militarum serve as mobile cover for the troops marching in their shadow.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is allocated to an INFANTRY model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of your VEHICLE, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is allocated to an INFANTRY model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of your VEHICLE, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

stratagems.name: INSPIRED COMMAND
stratagems.legend: The greatest officers make their voices heard at the critical moment, their orders swift and decisive.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Command phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM OFFICER unit from your army.EFFECT: Your OFFICER can issue one Order as if it were your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM OFFICER unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Your OFFICER can issue one Order as if it were your Command phase.

stratagems.name: REINFORCEMENTS!
stratagems.legend: So numerous are the infantry of the Astra Militarum that fresh reserves can be called up at a moment’s notice.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase.TARGET: One INFANTRY REGIMENT unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can target that unit with this Stratagem even though it was just destroyed.EFFECT: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with all of its wounds remaining.RESTRICTIONS: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units.
stratagems.target: One INFANTRY REGIMENT unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can target that unit with this Stratagem even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with all of its wounds remaining.RESTRICTIONS: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units.

stratagems.name: FLEXIBLE COMMAND
stratagems.legend: Some Astra Militarum officers have served with infantry and armour, and are equally adept at commanding either.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: Any number of ASTRA MILITARUM OFFICER units from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your Officers can issue Orders to REGIMENT units and SQUADRON units.
stratagems.target: Any number of ASTRA MILITARUM OFFICER units from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your Officers can issue Orders to REGIMENT units and SQUADRON units.

stratagems.name: AGAINST THE ODDS
stratagems.legend: Imperial Guardsmen faced by nightmarish foes in the close quarters of a boarding action may be driven to fight as never before to survive.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 2.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 2.

stratagems.name: DUCK AND COVER
stratagems.legend: Between training and the Human instinct for self-preservation, these soldiers manage to make the most of the available cover.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and has one or more models on the opposite side of an open Hatchway from one or more models in the attacking unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and has one or more models on the opposite side of an open Hatchway from one or more models in the attacking unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: IDLE HANDS
stratagems.legend: Spending a long time stuck in one section of a voidship leads bored soldiers to explore their surroundings and discover useful shortcuts in case of emergency.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Your unit can operate that Hatchway.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot operate a Hatchway again.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Your unit can operate that Hatchway.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot operate a Hatchway again.

stratagems.name: BRUTAL CHOKE POINT
stratagems.legend: The Tactica Imperialis teaches well how to exploit choke points to slaughter the foe. Its lessons transfer well to voidship corridors and chambers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that has not fired Overwatch this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

stratagems.name: BLAZING ADVANCE
stratagems.type: Hammer of the Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: By petitioning the machine spirits of their vehicles, tank crews push their armoured steeds beyond conventional limits.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Advances.TARGET: That SQUADRON unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Advances.
stratagems.target: That SQUADRON unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: FURIOUS CANNONADE
stratagems.type: Hammer of the Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: At close range, armoured vehicles open up with their full complement of weapons, dispensing the Emperor’s righteous wrath.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One SQUADRON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within 12", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.target: One SQUADRON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within 12", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: FINAL HOUR
stratagems.type: Hammer of the Emperor – Epic Deed Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Even with flames licking through the interior of their vehicle, this crew refuse to abandon their positions, regardless of the risk to their lives.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One SQUADRON unit from your army that is Below Half-strength (excluding OFFICER units).EFFECT: Until the end of the battle round, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding [ONE SHOT] weapons) have the [HAZARDOUS] ability, and each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and to the Hit roll.
stratagems.target: One SQUADRON unit from your army that is Below Half-strength (excluding OFFICER units).
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the battle round, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding [ONE SHOT] weapons) have the [HAZARDOUS] ability, and each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and to the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: CRASH THROUGH
stratagems.type: Hammer of the Emperor – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Ruins, barricades, bunkers; few such structures can impede the grinding advance of an Astra Militarum armoured corps.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.

stratagems.name: TACTICAL WITHDRAWAL
stratagems.type: Hammer of the Emperor – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Even in retreat, the armoured fist of the Astra Militarum keep their cannons firing.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Falls Back.TARGET: That SQUADRON unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That SQUADRON unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: ABLATIVE PLATING
stratagems.type: Hammer of the Emperor – Wargear Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Crews routinely reinforce their vehicle's armour, adding ablative plating, track links, sandbags and other means to protect the hull.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: SCOUTING OUTRIDERS
stratagems.type: Hammer of the Emperor – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Sentinels and cavalry units use their speed and mobility to outflank the foe, ready to strike at the most opportune moment.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s turn.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM MOUNTED or ASTRA MILITARUM WALKER unit from your army that is wholly within 10" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM MOUNTED or ASTRA MILITARUM WALKER unit from your army that is wholly within 10" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: CRACK SHOTS
stratagems.legend: Reconnaissance units are often comprised of experienced survivalists and hunters, many of whom are expert marksmen.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.
stratagems.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.name: COURAGEOUS DIVERSION
stratagems.legend: These soldiers scream blood-curdling battle cries as they rush forwards, emboldening their squadmates and causing the enemy to waver.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your opponent’s Shooting phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY or ASTRA MILITARUM MOUNTED unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, and each time an enemy model makes an attack, if your unit is the closest eligible target, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Start of your opponent’s Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY or ASTRA MILITARUM MOUNTED unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, and each time an enemy model makes an attack, if your unit is the closest eligible target, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: DRAW THEM OUT
stratagems.legend: Light infantry utilise harassing fire to draw their enemies into position for an ambush.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit, and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit, and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: SCRAMBLE FIELD
stratagems.legend: This unit is equipped with a scramble field generator, a device capable of disrupting teleportation beacons and other homing technology.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your opponent’s Reinforcements step.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of your unit.
stratagems.when: Start of your opponent’s Reinforcements step.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of your unit.

stratagems.name: TANGLEFOOT GRENADES
stratagems.legend: Employed by skirmishers and recon troops, tanglefoot grenades ensnare advancing infantry, slowing their advance.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM GRENADES unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as the target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).
stratagems.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM GRENADES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as the target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

stratagems.name: CLEAR AND SECURE
stratagems.legend: Mechanised charges rely upon shock, awe and speed to secure ground. Any enemies that block the path must be obliterated swiftly.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: SWIFT INTERCEPTION
stratagems.legend: Fast-moving armoured transports allow a commander to react quickly to enemy movements and intercept outflanking opponents.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: One TRANSPORT unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.EFFECT: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One TRANSPORT unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.effect: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: HASTY EXTRACTION
stratagems.legend: Should the tide turn against them, mechanised forces swiftly re-embark their transports in order to reposition.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Charge phase, after an enemy unit has selected targets for its charge but before it makes a Charge move.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.EFFECT: Provided your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and every model in your unit is within 3" of an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT from your army, it can embark within that TRANSPORT.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, after an enemy unit has selected targets for its charge but before it makes a Charge move.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
stratagems.effect: Provided your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and every model in your unit is within 3" of an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT from your army, it can embark within that TRANSPORT.

stratagems.name: MOVE OUT
stratagems.legend: High command’s priorities have shifted. Swift embarkation and redeployment is required.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s turn.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army.EFFECT: Provided your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and every model in your unit is within 3" of an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT from your army, it can embark within that TRANSPORT.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Provided your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and every model in your unit is within 3" of an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT from your army, it can embark within that TRANSPORT.

stratagems.name: RAPID DISPERSAL
stratagems.legend: Troops trained in mechanised combat disembark swiftly from their transport’s hatches, avoiding incoming fire and advancing on their objectives.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this phase. EFFECT: Your INFANTRY unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this phase.
stratagems.effect: Your INFANTRY unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

stratagems.name: VOX-RELAY
stratagems.legend: This armoured transport has been modified to house a tactical command suite and vox-relay, enabling embarked officers to give orders from relative safety.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One INFANTRY OFFICER unit from your army embarked within a TRANSPORT. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it is embarked within a TRANSPORT.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit can issue Orders even though it is not on the battlefield, and it can issue Orders to ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT units from your army [excluding TITANIC units) regardless of the distance to and from your unit’s TRANSPORT.
stratagems.target: One INFANTRY OFFICER unit from your army embarked within a TRANSPORT. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it is embarked within a TRANSPORT.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can issue Orders even though it is not on the battlefield, and it can issue Orders to ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT units from your army [excluding TITANIC units) regardless of the distance to and from your unit’s TRANSPORT.

stratagems.name: CALLOUS SACRIFICE
stratagems.legend: All victory requires sacrifice. The destruction of the enemy must always take priority over the preservation of lives.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.
stratagems.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

stratagems.name: TRENCH FIGHTERS
stratagems.legend: Inured to the savage horrors of trench warfare, these warriors will fight until their last breath.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if it is a REGIMENT model. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if it is a REGIMENT model. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: OVER THE TOP
stratagems.legend: The whistle blows to signal the attack. Waves of infantry emerge from cover to advance upon the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Command phase.TARGET: One INFANTRY OFFICER model from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, when your model issues the Move! Move! Move! Order, it can issue that Order to any number of eligible friendly INFANTRY REGIMENT units, regardless of range to your model.
stratagems.target: One INFANTRY OFFICER model from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, when your model issues the Move! Move! Move! Order, it can issue that Order to any number of eligible friendly INFANTRY REGIMENT units, regardless of range to your model.

stratagems.name: FURIOUS FUSILLADE
stratagems.legend: Whilst accuracy has its benefits, sheer weight of fire is no less effective at bringing down the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit while targeting an enemy unit within half range.
stratagems.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit while targeting an enemy unit within half range.

stratagems.name: FLARE BURST
stratagems.legend: As the infantry assault proceeds, flares are fired into the skies, illuminating opponents below.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes an attack that targets a visible enemy unit within 12", you can re-roll the Hit roll.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes an attack that targets a visible enemy unit within 12", you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: MINEFIELD
stratagems.legend: Sappers have laid down a network of mines across the battlefield. Should the enemy attempt an ill-advised assault, they will surely suffer for it.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.TARGET: One PLATOON unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit ends a Charge move within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
stratagems.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One PLATOON unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit ends a Charge move within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

stratagems.name: AGAINST THE ODDS
stratagems.type: Tempestus Boarding Regiment – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Tempestus Scions are trained in a range of specialist hand-to-hand combat techniques. Coupled with combat stimms, these make them bruising foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.
stratagems.target: One MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

stratagems.name: BRUTAL CHOKE POINT
stratagems.type: Tempestus Boarding Regiment – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Emptying the magazines of their weapons in an indiscriminate hail of fire, the Scions create a zone of lethality that foes will struggle to advance into.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase, just after a MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army has shot.TARGET: That MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, subtract 2 from the Move characteristic of models in that enemy unit, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.target: That MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, subtract 2 from the Move characteristic of models in that enemy unit, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

stratagems.name: IDLE HANDS
stratagems.type: Tempestus Boarding Regiment – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Voidborne Scions are trained to swiftly goad the machine spirits of bulkheads and hatches, slamming them shut in their wake to trap the foe.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, after your unit ends a move, you can select one open Hatchway it moved through during that move; close that Hatchway.
stratagems.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, after your unit ends a move, you can select one open Hatchway it moved through during that move; close that Hatchway.

stratagems.name: DUCK AND COVER
stratagems.type: Tempestus Boarding Regiment – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Employing coordinated helm chronos, the Scions execute a pre-arranged simultaneous tactical manoeuvre.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of your Command phase.TARGET: One OFFICER model from your army.EFFECT: Select one Order your model can issue. Every ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army is issued that Order (regardless of any keywords those units are normally required to have).RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, OFFICER models from your army cannot issue Orders. You can only use this Stratagem once.
stratagems.target: One OFFICER model from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one Order your model can issue. Every ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army is issued that Order (regardless of any keywords those units are normally required to have).RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, OFFICER models from your army cannot issue Orders. You can only use this Stratagem once.
